T02D2562:24b-0: @24b * // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2562:24b-1: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor bas byang
T02D2562:24b-2: chub kyi sems bsgom pa ni rang gi yi dam
T02D2562:24b-4: de'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jam glas pa cig bsgom /
T02D2562:24b-5: de'i lte ba la aa dkar po cig bsams la
T02D2562:24b-6: de la dmigs pa gtad nge spros bral du bsgom
T02D2562:24b-7: mo // byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i man dang //
